website_summaries.verdict: A restorative hair mask that can tackle any amount of hair damage.
pros: Rich, hydrating hair mask that works on all hair types
See results in as little as one treatment
cons: Those with fine hair may find this weighs them down a little

customer_reviews.title: Truly deep conditioning
customer_reviews.text: I used this deep repair masque just once, and I noticed a difference immediately. I have curly, thick hair, so most "deep" conditioners aren't effective. I need a very deep conditioning treatment that seeps into my hair, rather than sits on top without penetrating. This conditioner seeped into my strands, and after rinsing it out, my hair was softer. And the scent is great, it's very light. I'm looking forward to my hair's improved condition as I use this conditioner repeatedly over the next couple of months. I would recommend this masque to people with thick or curly hair like myself, but not for people with thin or fine hair, as it would likely weigh it down too much.
customer_reviews.author: axmom

customer_reviews.title: I had ordered before though and had good luck. But this time I'm pretty sure I ...
customer_reviews.text: I read many reviews stating that this was an imposter. I had ordered before though and had good luck. But this time I'm pretty sure I got the "imposter". The usually pleasant, light scent was now very strong. Instead of an off-white color this one had a pinkish tinge to it. It also weighs my hair down which is the exact opposite of how it made my hair feel previously. I guess there's a reason it was so much less expensive than buying it at my local department store. You get what you pay for....
customer_reviews.author: K. S.

customer_reviews.title: Works great!
customer_reviews.text: I have long (to my waist), colored hair with dry and damage ends. I use this product as a daily conditioner and it works great! It is not heavy and does not weigh down my fine hair. It also has a nice smell. If you use it as a deep conditioner, it works best to apply a generous amount, wrap your hair in a plastic bag, then wrap your head up in a hot towel or to apply heat in some other manner, such as the hair dryers at the salon. The heat will improve your hair's ability to absorb the conditioner and the results will be longer lasting.
customer_reviews.author: Shelly D

customer_reviews.title: I LOVE the Macadamia Oil Deep Repair Masque
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE the Macadamia Oil Deep Repair Masque. My hair is thick, dry, and very coarse. I've tried a lot of different brands and products, but I finally tried the masque after seeing a few online reviews about how smooth and straight it can make your hair. It isn't a miracle worker like others say (my hair is not straight), however, my hair does feel smoother and softer, but most importantly is less tangled, less frizzy, and less dry!
customer_reviews.author: Keahi

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for dry hair or daily moisture to replace condiitoner
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this stuff for years now as a replacement to conditioner. If my hair gets really dry (such as in the winter) I will leave it on for longer in the shower as a repair mask. It smells amazing. Loving my hair ever since I started using this stuff. I definitely recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Sara Cardenas

customer_reviews.title: Best Repair Mask Ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the best hair mask repair I have ever used so far. It works wonders on my hair, help me to get rid of my split ends problem, my hair is super soft and shiny now, growing healthy and heavy. Don't miss Macadamia products!! You will never regret. Deserve the 5 stars. Btw, this is not my first purchasing; I considered this brand as my frequent hair treatment but I think I became more greedy so I recently bought the giant size of every macadamia product that I could find lol... Qty of 2 of each item.. Don't like to run out of them.
customer_reviews.author: Cicim

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful Masque! But there is a cheaper alternative!!!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is a miracle worker!!! I had VERY damaged hair from a recent perm that didn't take to my hair, so I was left with frizzy and dry hair. Well, this masque fixed all the damage! It is great! The only thing is the super high price tag! Now, I use the L'Oreal hair masque for damaged hair because it works almost as well as the Macadamia and is so much cheaper ( Overall, great hair masque, just too expensive!
customer_reviews.author: lisahawk

customer_reviews.title: I use this every time I wash my hair now
customer_reviews.text: I know it's a masque that you don't need to use every day but I don't wash my hair every day because I have naturally very dry and frizzy hair. I only need a small amount and I have very thick naturally curly hair that gets frizzy. This takes lot of the frizz away and smells good. It is really heavy at first, but as you continue to use it, the smell gets less potent. This has lasted me months and my hair reaches down the middle of my back so I think it's a terrific value.
customer_reviews.author: Sunnysideotown

customer_reviews.title: This is the best conditioner I've ever used.
customer_reviews.text: As an African-American with chemically processed hair, I have tried a lot of conditioners over the years. This is hands down the best conditioner I have ever used. It makes my hair soft, silky and moisturized. I use it once a week, and once a month I will sit under a dryer for a deep conditioning. It's not greasy, doesn't weight my hair down and smells great. It's definitely worth the price.
customer_reviews.author: T.Daniels

customer_reviews.title: FORMALDEHYDE INGREDIENT
customer_reviews.text: Yes this may make your hair soft and smell great but there is a quaternium ingredient which is formaldehyde. Wouldn’t recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Best hair masque!
customer_reviews.text: I use this masque every few days and it makes my hair very soft. I've tried over 10 different deep conditioners, some far more expensive, and this one is by far my favorite! 100% recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Natalie H

customer_reviews.title: Smells chemically
customer_reviews.text: Do NOT buy this! The product doesn't work the same as the product from the store and leaves a chemical smell in your hair. I used once and returned the unused portion for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This masque is worth the investment
customer_reviews.text: I was introduced to this masque while visiting Scottsdale, AZ. I stopped in a beauty supply store just to seek color for my hair. I was given a sample of this masque. I have never turned away since then. It is over two years now. Faithfully this masque have put the body back into any loss. I love it. I am multi racial and my hair loose its curl when blown dry or adding color...this masque is my hair savior. Great stuff
customer_reviews.author: ER Wan

customer_reviews.title: PERFECT MASK FOR ANY HAIR TYPE
customer_reviews.text: I swear by this mask! I have bleach blonde hair (unnatural of course (: ) and this stuff works MIRACLES!!! I use a quarter size every time i wash my hair to replace normal conditioner, and it does not make make my hair greasy and my hair is fairly thin! My sister uses this 3 times a week and it really rehydrates her curls! 12/10 would recommend this to anyone who has dry or damaged hair!
customer_reviews.author: webb

customer_reviews.title: Okay Great Stuff!!!!
customer_reviews.text: i love this conditioner it's great for curly textured hair and it came on time will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: hopefully

customer_reviews.title: Would definitely recommend
customer_reviews.text: I am on growing my hair out naturally and needed a deep conditioner that would moisturize my hair without the need for additional product aside from a small amount of hair lotion. I saw a review on the Macadamia Oil Deep Repair Masque and decided to try it in place of my deep conditioner. It has worked wonders. I've been using it for about a month now, and my hair isn't dry nor is it oily. It feels smooth and light. I don't have to put a ton of oil in my hair. It feels great. I'll be using this one for the foreseeable future.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Carter

customer_reviews.title: Amazing hair product
customer_reviews.text: Using this product is the absolute BEST thing I have every done for my hair. I have hair that is oily at the scalp and dry on the ends. It is processed and goes through daily flat ironing or curling irons. I use a little of this masque in the shower every day and my hair looks so much healthier--is softer, stronger, and more easy to manage. It leaves no oily residue, just healthy hair.
customer_reviews.author: DLJ

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME!
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is GREAT! leaves hair soooo soft! I'm mainly a Carol's Daughter product user & this compliments their line very well. Great price, a little goes a long way. My hair's naturally curly, on the coarse side, long,& thinning @ 44 yrs. Old & this is great for moisture & bouncy curls for sure! Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Kristina A.

customer_reviews.title: Great product awesome price
customer_reviews.text: I have used this once already I purchased a silver heat shower cap and put that on over the product and let it sit for the recommended time. I have very over processed hair and this left my hair very soft and happy. The only negative thing I can say is your going to have to clean your shower stall after using the product leaves quite a dangerous slippery residue behind.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernBelle

customer_reviews.title: Works wonders as a deep conditioner
customer_reviews.text: I love this product. It's worked well on maintaining moisture in my now 8 year olds hair. She quite active so the frequent washes were making her hair dry and brittle. This has definitely revitalized and repaired!!! Recommend product and seller!
customer_reviews.author: Tiffany F.

customer_reviews.title: Great value and product!
customer_reviews.text: Good price, amount, smell and product. I could definitely tell it was nourishing my hair, and I use about a kiwi-size amount every time I wash my hair and it’s lasted me months. Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome. Nothing fake that I can tell
customer_reviews.text: Awesome. Nothing fake that I can tell. I've used Macadamia deep repair masque before and this one looks and smells and work just like the ones I've used before. The masque made my hair grew longer and faster in 6 months then it normally would! Definitely buying again!
customer_reviews.author: Shop4ever

customer_reviews.title: GREAT PRODUCT
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product. Not only does it work wonders, but the seller checked on me right away to make sure that I was satisfied. Shipping was so quick too!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Don't think this is the real one!
customer_reviews.text: I don't think this is the real masque. Compared to the last one I bought this one is entirely different in color, texture and scent. It also left my hair in pretty crappy condition compared to the last one I bought which worked wonders. Super disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Emily

customer_reviews.title: Smells so good and my hair becomes so soft after
customer_reviews.text: I love this product so much, it smells so nice and every time I use, my hair feels so hydrated and soft. I want to use every day but I am arfaid that my hair get too used to having it so I use once a week or so. When I went to a high end hair salon, they were using it and I was so happy that the pro even think it's good.
customer_reviews.author: H. Simon

customer_reviews.title: *Shrug
customer_reviews.text: I really didn't notice a change in my hair after using it. Didn't make it softer or healthy looking. Maybe your hair has to be really dry and damaged to take advantage of this product. I would say it smells nice. A little bit like how Herbal Essences used to smell (but not as good) before they changed it to the fruity scents they have now.
customer_reviews.author: L. Tran

customer_reviews.title: The Clinique of Hair Products
customer_reviews.text: This mask definitely heals my hair. I have awful hair, so it's best for me to use it 3 times a week. I can actually brush my hair now without it puffing out ^^ And my split ends are noticeably healing. Definitely worth the money-on the web site it is around $60 and on amazon it is only $25 (for 16.9 oz) Definitely try it!
customer_reviews.author: whatpaigeesaid

customer_reviews.title: makes my hair so and smells amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this product, It makes my hair softer than any other product I use, however I do with that the deep conditioner came in a pump because it is difficult to use to the tub for everyday use in the shower
customer_reviews.author: Pat

customer_reviews.title: My hair felt like silk!
customer_reviews.text: Used it yesterday and MAN!!! My hair felt like silk!! It feels amazing! And the jar is huge!! Thank you!
customer_reviews.author: Masallah cetin

customer_reviews.title: Smells Great
customer_reviews.text: This masque smells really, REALLY good (like I could still smell it in my hair 12 hours later) but I feel like it had little affect on the overall health of my hair. On the days where I would use it, my hair was noticeably softer and smoother but in the long run, I feel like it's not worth the price because it didn't really have any lasting affects.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Zoeller

customer_reviews.title: Believe the Hype!
customer_reviews.text: After a hair bleaching fiasco, my hair was DRY, DRY,DRY. It felt like a brillo pad. My sister-in-law told I would need some intensive hair conditioning to get it back near normal.I had wanted to use this Deep Conditioner before I destroyed my hair. SO i decided to buy this and give it a try. After ONE application my dry, brillo bleached hair, it was shiny, soft and smelled great. My hair looked better than it did ever before. I do this once a week and my hair looks great, the color has been preserved, and I am never trying anything else. Ever.
customer_reviews.author: NatZen

customer_reviews.title: Great for My Dry Hair
customer_reviews.text: This mask works so well for me. This is my second purchase of this product. My hair is VERY dry and responds well to this product - I use it with every wash.
customer_reviews.author: Rabbit

customer_reviews.title: The Best!
customer_reviews.text: Love it Love Love it!! I love this conditioner!! it smells amazing and leaves my hair feeling amazing as well. I always add coconut oil to it as well. I am natural with very coarse hair, so after braids or any other protective style this is my #1 deep conditioner!!!
customer_reviews.author: Miya

customer_reviews.title: I really enjoy this hair masque
customer_reviews.text: I fell for the trap! This really does work! It makes your hair silky smooth as if you treat it everyday. I really enjoy this hair masque.
customer_reviews.author: ShopnProbs

customer_reviews.title: i love this product and will definitely buy more when i ...
customer_reviews.text: use it as described and my hair is so soft. i love this product and will definitely buy more when i run out. it smells amazing and i definitely think it made my hair softer
customer_reviews.author: Christin

customer_reviews.title: Love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Great, awesome, amaizing, fantastic!! Mix it with the macademia oil and you get a super dooper mask. Take your time and keep it on your hair for more than 15 minutes and you will see the difference.
customer_reviews.author: tapia

customer_reviews.title: BEST STUFF OUT THERE
customer_reviews.text: I loveeee this hair masque. I use it as a daily conditioner, which I try to switch between my conditioners. So I'd say I use this stuff 3 times a week. I love it. The smell is amazing and is like no other product. It also lasts until the next time I shower. It really makes my hair feel smoother and sleeker. I have curly, coarse hair, so if you have similar a hair type, DEFINITELY GET THIS PRODUCT. I will be repurchasing it asap! another good thing about this product is that it feels like the jar is never emptying for the amount of times I use it!
customer_reviews.author: kristinuhhh

customer_reviews.title: Love it! I have used this product for years
customer_reviews.text: Love it! I have used this product for years. Use it once a week. Leave in for 20 min. rinse, my hair is soft and manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Angela K.Hall

customer_reviews.title: Great conditioning product
customer_reviews.text: I bought a 16.9 oz jar almost a year ago and I use it almost everyday. I just reordered it because it does a nice job adding extra conditioning to your hair. It's been highly recommended by many and I think it's a great choice.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Gray

customer_reviews.title: and only one use of this product the ends feel so soft I really recommend
customer_reviews.text: I recently got an ombre on my hair and because of the bleach the ends of my hair got really damaged and dry. and only one use of this product the ends feel so soft I really recommend it
customer_reviews.author: Nelieanne Rivera

customer_reviews.title: Soft and Shiny hair!
customer_reviews.text: This made my hair look really shiny and after using it multiple times, I find that my hair is super soft. I see a bit of growth too, and trust me when I say my hair grows SLOW, it really does. But after using this I find that it grew a little more faster than it normally would.
customer_reviews.author: Josephine C

customer_reviews.title: This is the best conditioner I have ever used
customer_reviews.text: This is the best conditioner I have ever used. Not only does it smell great it works. I have very thick hair and it is long and it doesn't take much of this product to condition my hair. I highly recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandra Bois

customer_reviews.title: Smells Heavenly!
customer_reviews.text: I love this product! It smells absolutely amazing and has a lot of slip for a conditioner. I actually use it every day since I have wavy/curly and prone to dry hair.
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: MUST HAVE
customer_reviews.text: This is just one of those products that you have to keep in your shower, it is great for regular use or a mask. I love all of their products. Works best in combination with their oil.
customer_reviews.author: Lydia

customer_reviews.title: ok
customer_reviews.text: not sure what happen with this brand ! got this product few years ago when the star to sale it and was unbelievable !!!! not sure what happen with this product now but the quality is not the same anymore .
customer_reviews.author: N.AngelicaGD

customer_reviews.title: This makes my hair so strong!
customer_reviews.text: This conditioner smells so good and it really works. My hair is stronger than before and is growing more than it used to as well. And it lasts for a long time. I use it once or twice a week and still have a lot left in the container. It is great!
customer_reviews.author: Leslie Reid

customer_reviews.title: My favorite!!!
customer_reviews.text: Loooove this mask. My daughter and I both use it. We have very thick hair. Can get a comb or brush through wonderfully.
customer_reviews.author: Kellyann

customer_reviews.title: Excellant product!
customer_reviews.text: I bought the trial packet at ULTA and loved it... Now I have the larger size for half the price through Amazon. The product itself is thick and you don't need a lot for it to do its job. I have long hair and apply it in the shower leaving it in for about 5 minutes, the key is to rinse well and use an excellent product to prevent damage from irons and blow drying. I always blow dry my hair on the warm setting and after using the masque my hair is soft and manageable (bonus no split ends).
customer_reviews.author: Shelley B.

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This is the best deep conditioning! My hair is more manageable.
customer_reviews.author: Bella

customer_reviews.title: Might be fake...
customer_reviews.text: So I've been using this product for about 3 weeks and have seen no results. I got this from YOLO Beauty. I think this product might be fake, but I haven't gone to the store to do a comparison. It came with the barcode covered by a white sticker. The first time I tried this product (not from Amazon), I could tell that it worked on my hair by the time I washed it out. However, the first time with this, my hair was still dry. I'm assuming it's a cheap conditioner put into this container and sold for $25+. It is an off-white (kind of peachy) color and it is a little shimmery.
customer_reviews.author: K

customer_reviews.title: The real deal...the best stuff out there!
customer_reviews.text: Not sure about other's experience saying this is fake, but mine was the real deal. I would know the difference because I've paid top dollar for this masque else where. This masque is worth every penny...I have tried it all and NOTHING compares to what this does for my hair!
customer_reviews.author: rebecca l valencia

customer_reviews.title: brown n had an odd smell
customer_reviews.text: The product was discoloured when i recieved it. My very first order was perl white, smelt great and worked magnificently.... my second 2 tubs where brown and had a cocobutter smell, im not sure it even works. Tsk
customer_reviews.author: Ms. Black

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love this product, it works wonder for the scalp and hair
customer_reviews.author: melisa x3

customer_reviews.title: meh
customer_reviews.text: Not sure if this is the real thing or not, but it did nothing for my hair. Waste of money, would not repurchase.
customer_reviews.author: E. Meissen

customer_reviews.title: Sweet scent
customer_reviews.text: Terrific prize for the large size. I like to wash my hair, leave the masque on, and go workout. When I shower after the gym my hair is so silky and smooth. I have fine hair and it doesn't weigh it down.
customer_reviews.author: oc teacher kim

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: This is an excellent product! I have wavy hair which can be frizzy and dull at times, but this product leaves my hair looking healthy and smells good. I use it once a week/two weeks.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Wilches

customer_reviews.title: Great mask for dry hair
customer_reviews.text: Great mask for dry hair. I have been using it for 3yr. I use it after shampoo as a conditioner and leave 10 minutes before wash it. Highly Recommended
customer_reviews.author: reem

customer_reviews.title: Love this stuff
customer_reviews.text: Love this stuff!! It smells great, works great, and is affordable. My hair is softer and less frizzy. Will buy again!
customer_reviews.author: AOlsson

customer_reviews.title: It's not fake
customer_reviews.text: There are a lot of reviews saying its fake, but it's not. It is 100% real. I've gotten this at ultra before, I ran out and was searching for a cheaper way to get it. And this is it
customer_reviews.author: Emilee

customer_reviews.title: My Hair is Like Silk
customer_reviews.text: I can only describe my hair akin to silk after using this. It's been a month since I started using it and my hair is absolutely amazing now. My hair is normally pretty soft and manageable. I'm growing my hair out so I have to deal with split ends more often now, and this product seems to keep them tame. I use it twice a week as recommended and I've had a couple of remarks from my friends on how silky my hair looks the day after use.
customer_reviews.author: JJTop Contributor: Pets

customer_reviews.title: very good
customer_reviews.text: Product arrived quickly, that's exactly what I wanted, a lot of time looking for this product and finally found it and it suits me very much that softens hair and makes it more comfortable
customer_reviews.author: ayelet

customer_reviews.title: i am in love with this
customer_reviews.text: i am in love with this! i use it every other day and it does not leave my hair oily, just soft and fab!
customer_reviews.author: E

customer_reviews.title: Just what I expected :)
customer_reviews.text: It cost me less than it would at Ulta, and it's the same product! Helps my bleach-damaged hair recover, I use it every time I shower.
customer_reviews.author: Eskimino Thunderbunny

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: I ABSOLUTELY LOVE IT. It works awesome on my hair, I don't have to use as much and my hair has changed dramatically since I have started using these.
customer_reviews.author: Jess

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: not the same results as everyone who praised this product
customer_reviews.author: Calina and Winston

customer_reviews.title: Best Deep Conditioner!
customer_reviews.text: Leaves hair tangle free, soft, and smelling delicious; and the smell really lingers which I like but may be annoying for people sensitive to fragrance.
customer_reviews.author: Vanessa Sotelo

customer_reviews.title: Great Product
customer_reviews.text: Smells really good and it leaves my hair feeling really soft. Just a great conditioner that you won't regret trying out.
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Wow!
customer_reviews.text: I've been a hairdresser for over 45 years. This is the best deep conditioner I have ever used. Just buy it!
customer_reviews.author: Janet S.

customer_reviews.title: My hair loves this
customer_reviews.text: It makes my hair soft, smooth,and it give it lots of moisture .I like this stuff alot i just wish it was cheap .i do get lot of shine but its a natural shine not an oily shine it and it really great for new growth plus you don't have to use alot you just need alittle bit its great.
customer_reviews.author: India

customer_reviews.title: Makes my hair soft
customer_reviews.text: Makes my dry super wavy hair so soft with a healthy natural look.

customer_reviews.title: OK, BUT PRICEY!
customer_reviews.text: THIS CONDITIONING MASQUE DOESNT SEEM LIKE IT WORKS, ITS VERY RUNNY AND I DIDNT REALLY SEE A BIG DIFFERENCE IN MY HAIR.
customer_reviews.author: W. Aguirre

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product because of all the girls in YouTube saying how amazing it was... I have to agree! My hair feels so healthy. I love it!
customer_reviews.author: shivels

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I LOVE LOVE LOVE this masque! I use it on every wash day.
customer_reviews.author: MissHarvey

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: smells awesome & makes my hair feel like it has some life!
customer_reviews.author: Shanna M. Tang

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good for my dry hair. Will buy it again
customer_reviews.author: enndash

customer_reviews.title: Most Amazing Conditioner EVER!
customer_reviews.text: I purchase this once every couple of months. It smells incredible and a little REALLY goes a long way! It leave a very strong and beautiful smell in your hair, i have never gotten so many compliments! I use it for my daily conditioner and about a quarter size will do the trick! LOVE THIS PRODUCT AND RECOMMEND IT TO EVERYONE!!
customer_reviews.author: christine cipres

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I had de Moroccan oil mask, and it didn't work as good as this one. Besides It's a great deal, it's a lot cheaper than other places. Totally recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Laura

customer_reviews.title: Great product!
customer_reviews.text: This arrived exactly as described in good condition. I love the scent and how it moisturizers my hair. Please note that if you are sensitive to scents it may be too strong for you but otherwise smells lovely. This product keeps my hair nice and soft and is a keeper for me!
customer_reviews.author: A reader

customer_reviews.title: Macadamia Repair Masque
customer_reviews.text: I love the way this masque makes my hair Feel and smell. I will definitely buy this product again. I have also bought this for my friends and familly and they all love it.

customer_reviews.title: my hair was perfect with this hair mask
customer_reviews.text: it deserve five stars, my hair was perfect with this hair mask.
customer_reviews.author: huda

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I love this product, I've been using it for the past year.
customer_reviews.author: Jaimie McAlexander

customer_reviews.title: Bad product. Returned!
customer_reviews.text: Like some others said, the product is orangey-pink, watery, and kinda lumpy. Not sure if the seller sells both authentic or counterfeit product but looks like I got a bad batch. I had received a free sample for this before and the texture is supposed to be white, and dense, kinda like butter. RETURNED.
customer_reviews.author: Echan

customer_reviews.title: I love it. Although
customer_reviews.text: I've been using this mask religiously for a few years. I love it. Although, the bucket I received from my most recent purchase was of a different consistency and color than any of the other buckets I've ever purchased. I hope I didn't get an imposter bucket. I'm wondering if the company reformulated. If you do you buy this and the stuff inside is brown and creamy and heavy - you're good! Great product. I'll have to research my white, fluffy, textured bucket that arrived this week.
customer_reviews.author: lynn genser

customer_reviews.title: Also received a fake
customer_reviews.text: Didn't really believe Amazon would approve sellers that sell fake products so purchased this and knew it was fake as soon as I opened the tub. The real stuff is really thick, cream colored and smells a bit nutty, the one I received was thin, the consistency of regular conditioner, was a peach-ish color and had a strong artificial floral scent. Definitely not legitimate. So disappointing - will be contacting Amazon for a refund.
customer_reviews.author: T. Lu

customer_reviews.title: Macadamia Oil Deep Repair
customer_reviews.text: Love the product as I have been using for years. Seller ia one of the best on Amazon! Thanks much!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I use this every time I wash my hair love it
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: My hair hasn't been this soft in YEARS!
customer_reviews.text: I loved this product! My hair has gone through a lot over the past few years, lots and lots of dying. I've tried several masques and deep conditioning treatments, but never has my hair had this result. My hair really hasn't been this soft in years.
customer_reviews.author: panda

customer_reviews.title: Love love love
customer_reviews.text: This stuff is great! I used it for the first time and it made my fried looking hair look like the life came back to it.
customer_reviews.author: izzybella

customer_reviews.title: Almost as good as Moroccan oil
customer_reviews.text: This hair mask was recommended to me by a friend. It is very good. Costs about half the price of the moroccan oil version.
customer_reviews.author: TBH1977

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Love it! You will too. Buy it. It's worth it.
customer_reviews.author: G. Brown

customer_reviews.title: Length and strength guaranteed
customer_reviews.text: The macadamia oil deep repair masque is protective and strengthens the hair from root to tip. Keeps hair from breaking, i went without a relaxer more than ten weeks and my hair was so strong I sustained no major breakage. I also purchased the shampoo and the oil moisturizer.
customer_reviews.author: LeChelle M. Durante

customer_reviews.title: OMG SOFT!!
customer_reviews.text: i ordered to help the ends of my hair which are so damaged and also for my daughter who has really bad dry damaged hair, THIS STuFF IS AMAZING. it left my hair so soft its hard to use it ONLY once a week (my hair is naturally oily so no need to go overboard) and did wonders fro my daughters hair...in fact any family member who stays long enough to shower is talking into trying it, and everyone has loved it thus far, something i will repurchase!
customer_reviews.author: jezz

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: the only thing that works on my hair in the shower
customer_reviews.author: Christie L. Strong

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great product; however, it expired to quickly and I had to throw half of it away.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra

customer_reviews.title: amazing is an understatement
customer_reviews.text: I had originaly tried this product after seeing it at ULTA. I had heard many great things about it and the MoroccanOil line. After one use my hair felt like it had just came back from a vacation in Heaven. I used it about twice a month along with the leave in oil and creme. These products smell amazing, Im constantly getting complements for how may hair looks and smells.
customer_reviews.author: Robin

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love how my hair feels after using it! Soft and manageable, easy to control and style. And affordable too, great.
customer_reviews.author: Yvette Vazquez-Sanchez

customer_reviews.title: It's a great product!
customer_reviews.text: Definitely not a fake just received it!!! It's a great product!!
customer_reviews.author: Chauna13

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!!!
customer_reviews.text: Love this!!! My hair is very fine and prone to a lot of breakage. I use this one a week and leave it for about 5 minutes in. It makes my hair soft, smelling great, and most of all, I have been seeing a lot of improvement. With a hair trim every two months, and with minimal use of heat for styling, my hair is showing lots of improvement!!
customer_reviews.author: Jackielynter10

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Amazing mask for hair! Softens it and makes it so easy to handle afterwards
customer_reviews.author: Joelle M

customer_reviews.title: Not good! Don't buy
customer_reviews.text: Product was rancid or the container was filled with a different product. Not good! Don't buy!
customer_reviews.author: Loves To Bake

product_meta.title: Macadamia Oil Deep Repair Masque, 16 Ounce
product_meta.description:
At Last! The Foot Cream You’ve Been Waiting For!

Are you always on the go and have to spend all day on your feet in your uncomfortable shoes?

Do you suffer from calluses and hate your dry and cracked heels?

Are you looking for a way to be sandal-season ready but no foot cream has given you the results you need?

Then look no further because we’ve got you covered!

The BUOCEANS Foot Exfoliating Scrub Gel is everything you’ve been looking for!

Specification:

Weight:150g

Gender: Unisex

Season: Spring, Summer, Autumn, Winter

How to use:

Step One -Keep the feet dry

Step Two -Get some scrub on feet, Perform a full massage

Step Three -Wash with water,give you a smooth feet.

This amazing product will deeply moisturize and nourish your feet so that your skin can be completely restored and so you can be free of painful calluses and unattractive cracked skin.

Your feet will be healthy and soft and your heels ready for your favorite pair of sandals!
feature_bullets: 1.Provides deep nourishment and ultra conditioning hair reconstruction
3.Leaves hair silky, full of movement and bounce
